column4: how do i go about uninstalling an eggdrop? just delete the folder?

in the future, you should use APT to install things.  Then you can remove it with apt.  Yes, you can just delete the directory now.  Or check if there is an uninstall rule in the Makefile and use 'make uninstall'
best is subjective.  If you want something in a shell, try vim (and some people like emacs)
